Description: A beautifully newly renovated 1 BD, 1 Bath. New kitchen with stainless steel appliances, new counter tops and hardwood flooring. New A/C and paint. Located In a very desirable area. Minutes away from several major highways, a walk away from strip malls, supermarket, post office, etc, and minutes from vibrant and fun downtown Waltham! 2 Parking places, well maintained grounds, beautiful new pool, tennis courts, etc. Heat and hot water included!
